d1_text:
Npc0124:
[CREATE_NPC_EMOTE 124 EXCLAMATION]
[PAUSE 60][DELETE_NPC_EMOTE 124]
[DELETE_NPC 124 6]
[CREATE_OBJ 45 8 1]
ï¿½Wha-![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[GET_DIR_FROM_OBJ 45 PMEMBER NESS][SET_OBJ_DIR 45 0]
ï¿½Oh![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You woke me up...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Pokey![PAUSE 15]  I've been looking all over for you...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You see,[PAUSE 15] Pokey got scared and ran away...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Well, I'm glad that you're okay at least...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Let's go home now.[PAUSE 20]  I bet Mom and Dad are worried sick about us.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Geez![PAUSE 15]  Sometimes I wonder which one of us is the real big brother.[WAIT][PLAY_SFX 16]
[GOSUB L_C681F0]
[SET_FLAG PICKY_IN_PARTY]
[SET_FLAG ALOYSIUS_AT_HOME]
[SET_FLAG LARDNA_AT_HOME]
[ENABLE_HOTSPOT 1 15 L_C5EA45]
[SET_FLAG KING_WONT_JOIN]
[CLR_FLAG PICKY_SLEEPING_AT_METEORITE]
[CLR_FLAG POKEYS_HOUSE_LOCKED]
[SET_FLAG ENEMY_SUPPRESS]
[END]
